feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
